Title: Friendly Persuasion
Cast: Gary Cooper, Dorothy McGuire, Anthony Perkins, Richard Eyer, Robert Middleton, Phyllis Love, Peter Mark Richman, Walter Catlett, Richard Hale, Joel Fluellen, Theodore Newton, John Smith, Edna Skinner, Marjorie Durant, Frances Farwell
Plot: The pacifist attitude of a Quaker family is tested as a result of the American Civil War. The story of a family of Quakers in Indiana in 1862. Their religous sect is strongly opposed to violence and war. It's not easy for them to meet the rules of their religion in everyday life but when Southern troops pass the area they are in real trouble. Should they fight, despite their peaceful attitide? Written by Olaf Mertens <olafbahg@w210zrz.zrz.tu-berlin.de>
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 4 nominations.
Location: Bidwell Park - Manzanita Avenue, Chico, California, USA
Actors: Gary Cooper, Dorothy McGuire, Anthony Perkins
Description: Directed by William Wyler.  With Gary Cooper, Dorothy McGuire, Anthony Perkins, Richard Eyer. The pacifist attitude of a Quaker family is tested as a result of the American Civil War.
